arts.ttl: Joy for Sligo Rovers as they defeat Derry City at the Showgrounds
arts.sum: Indeed, it was the home side who took the lead with former Derry City defender McClean, brother of Republic of Ireland international James, powering the ball beyond Brian Maher with a thumping finish on twenty minutes after a Jake Doyle Hayes corner. Sligo Rovers: Sam Sargeant; Ollie Denham, William Fitzgerald, Patrick McClean, Conor Reynolds (Daire Patton 89); Jake Doyle Hayes, Owen Elding, Jad Hakiki, James McManus, Ryan O'Kane (Kyle McDonagh 76); Wilson Waweru (Francely Lomboto 61).
